ClientFactory - Class in it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.client
Operazioni da esportare nel client 1 creare l'Abstract client concreto installando la view, l'host e la porta 2 connettere l'abstract client al server, se rifiutato ricreare un nuovo abstract client 3 effettuare il login (4 utilizzare sendEventToNetwork per inviare informazioni al giocatore) 5 chiamare disconnect per disconnettersi legalmente

CurrentPlayerException - Exception in it.polimi.se2018.exception.gameboard_exception
The class CurrentPlayerException is a subclass of GameException It's a checked exceptions and it need to be declared in a method or constructor's throws clause if they can be thrown by the execution of the method or constructor and propagate outside the method or constructor boundary.
